text:
Wasn't there a lesson today?
Take it easy, okay?

...Yeah. As the representative of the ordinary folks,
I'll do my best today too.

...Your hands look cold.
If you want, you can use my gloves. Sorry for offering mine.

...That's really okay.
I'm fine, thank you.

...I see.
Well then, just wait a moment.

Here, it's tea... It'll warm up your hands.
────See you later.
